title: Blink
text: Blinking every 5 to 10 seconds will keep your eyes moist.

title: Breath
text: It is important to allow oxygen to enter your lungs and push the carbon dioxide outside of your lungs. Without this procedure, your body will die.

title: Sleep
text: No one knows why you need it. You just do. So close your eyes, pretend you are dead, and possibly hallucinate for the next 8 hours.

title: Eat
text:
Some things are safe to ingest. Some things are not. 
Candy, good. 
Tide pods, bad.
